material: steel wire rope with PVC coating, EVA foam handles with inner/outer cotton, plastic handle components
usage: Used for skipping and jump rope exercise for fat burning workouts, fitness training, and cardio at home, in the gym, or outdoors.
key_features: Strong and durable rope made of high quality steel wire covered with a strong PVC outer layer
Wear-resistant, stable and non-floating wire rope for long service life and reduced wear
Easily adjustable rope length to customize for different users
Length adjustable design with bottom cover and latch mechanism
Customize length by unscrewing cover, loosening latch, adjusting and cutting excess
360° swivel / anti-twine steel bearings for tangle-free rotation
PVC coated braided steel cables built for speed
EVA foam handle that is non-slip, sweat-absorbent and comfortable to hold
Ergonomic handle with soft non-slip memory foam for better grip and comfort
Promoted as supporting a healthy lifestyle, with 10 minutes of rope skipping ≈ 30 minutes of jogging plus active calorie burning
ai_description: Adjustable black jump rope with red-accented, 6-inch EVA foam handles and slim PVC-coated braided steel cable. Close-up callouts highlight non-slip, sweat-absorbing grips, anti-tangle steel bearings, and cut-to-fit length adjustment. Shown in use by adults and a child outdoors and in a gym.
target_audience: Men, women, and kids looking for an adjustable jump rope for exercise, fat burning, and general fitness training.
product_name: KAKSS Skipping Rope - Jumping Rope Adjustable For Men Women Kids - Jump Rope For Exercise Fat burning Workout Home or Gym personal Training Rope (Black/Red)
